import React from 'react'; import AreaChart from '../../components/Chart_Components/AreaChart'; import {Row, Col,Accordion, Card,Form} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {SliderPicker } from 'react-color'; import { useState } from 'react'; const labels = ['January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July']; const Area_data = { labels, datasets: [ { fill: true, label: 'Dataset 2', data: [12,12,32,45,67,45,23], borderColor: 'rgb(53, 162, 235)', backgroundColor: 'rgba(53, 162, 235, 0.5)', }, { fill: true, label: 'Dataset 3', data: [22,2,42,25,37,15,43], borderColor: 'rgb(223, 122, 235)', backgroundColor: 'rgba(223, 112, 235, 0.5)', } ], }; const AreaChartView = () => { const [x_grid, set_x_grid] = useState(true); const [y_grid, set_y_grid] = useState(true); const [step_size_x,set_x_step] = useState(5); const [step_size_y,set_y_step] = useState(5); const [bar_orientation,set_bar_orientation] = useState('x'); const [text_size,set_text_size] = useState(14); const [title_size,set_title_size] = useState(30); const [font,set_font] = useState('Raleway'); const [orientation,set_orientation] = useState(0); const [color,setcolor] = useState("#234400"); const [color2,setcolor2] = useState("#124490"); const AreaCustomize = { indexAxis: bar_orientation, scales: { x: { grid: { display: x_grid //x axis grid show }, ticks: { stepSize: step_size_x, maxRotation: orientation, // changing direction.. change both values to 0 if u want to change.. minRotation: orientation, font: { size: text_size,//this change the font size of x axis, family: font, // Your font family } } }, y: { grid: { display: y_grid //x axis grid show }, ticks: { stepSize: step_size_y, maxRotation: orientation, // changing direction.. change both values to 0 if u want to change.. minRotation: orientation, font: { size: text_size,//this change the font size of x axis, family: font, // Your font family } } } }, responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top' , }, title: { display: true, text: 'Chart.js Area Chart', font: { size: title_size, family: font, // Your font family }, }, }, }; return( Customize the Graph
Modify Chart Show X Axis Grids {set_x_grid(!x_grid)}} /> Show Y Axis Grids {set_y_grid(!y_grid)}} /> Step Size X {set_x_step(e.target.value)}} defaultValue={5} min='2' max='50' /> Step Size Y {set_y_step(e.target.value)}} defaultValue={5} min='2' max='50' /> {

} Axis Orientation {set_bar_orientation(e.target.value)}} size="sm" > Change the Colors Color For Attribute 1 {

} Color For Attribute 2 Show Y Axis Grids {

} Bars Orientation Modify the Text Text Size {set_text_size(e.target.value)}} defaultValue={14} min='10' max='40' /> Title Size {set_title_size(e.target.value)}} defaultValue={30} min='10' max='50' /> Font Family {set_font(e.target.value)}}> Text Orientation {set_orientation(e.target.value)}} >
) } export default AreaChartView;
